TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1022
TEI.2.document_title: Knight and White to Stephen F. Austin, 01-22-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: Knight and White to Austin, January 22, 1825. Concerning land and surveying
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1022

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Knight and White to Austin, January 22, 1825. Concerning land and surveying */p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"* *p**location_mentioned*Fort Settlement*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="01-22-1825">Jany 22d 1825*/date_mentioned*,*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Sir We are informed by *person_mentioned*Capt. Chreesman*/person_mentioned* that the Quarter of a league of land we are to receive in right of the late *person_mentioned*Capt. Singer*/person_mentioned* has been laid off in the *location_mentioned*rear of a Quarter belonging to *person_mentioned*Mr. Nelson*/person_mentioned*—*/location_mentioned* */p* *p*From our intimacy with *person_mentioned*Capt. Singer*/person_mentioned* we know it was not his wish to have in that way and we assure you it is entirely contrary to ours—We state this to you thinking it must have been represented that we prefered it in the way it is now surveyed and request that you will permit it to be run through *location_mentioned*from the river to the prairie*/location_mentioned* in the same manner that all the other *location_mentioned*Quarters*/location_mentioned* have been—
*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Knightand White*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*P. S. *person_mentioned*Mr. White*/person_mentioned* will leave here next week for *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned* and will take charge of any thing you may wish to send with pleasure— one of us will be up in a day */p* *p**person_mentioned*K and W*/person_mentioned* */p*
*/div1*
